Package kentekencheck

Class APIClass

java.lang.Object
kentekencheck.APIClass
Direct Known Subclasses:
OverheidApi, RDWApi
public abstract class APIClass extends Object
Abstract base class for API implementations that fetches vehicle data.

Subclasses must provide API-specific details such as the endpoint URL, parameters, JSON parsing, and date formatting.

  • Method Details

    • getApiUrl

      public abstract String getApiUrl()
      Returns the base URL of the API. (e.g., https://opendata.rdw.nl/resource/m9d7-ebf2.json)
      Returns:
      the API base URL as a String

    • getApiParams

      public abstract String getApiParams()
      Returns the query parameters used by the API. (e.g., ?$where=kenteken=)
      Returns:
      a String containing the API query parameters

    • getDatePattern

      public abstract String getDatePattern()
      Returns the date format pattern used in the API's date fields.
      Returns:
      a String representing the date format pattern (e.g., "yyyyMMdd")

    • buildUri

      public abstract StringBuffer buildUri(String data_table, String license)
      Builds a full URI to request vehicle data from a given data table and license.
      Parameters:
      data_table - The name of the data table or endpoint
      license - The vehicle license plate number
      Returns:
      a StringBuffer containing the full URI

    • getJsonKeys

      public abstract String[] getJsonKeys()
      Returns the expected JSON keys from the API response.
      Returns:
      an array of String keys

    • parseJSONObject

      public abstract com.google.gson.JsonObject parseJSONObject(String json)
      Parses a raw JSON string into a JsonObject.
      Parameters:
      json - the raw JSON string
      Returns:
      a parsed JsonObject

    • parseJSONVehicle

      public abstract VehicleClass parseJSONVehicle(com.google.gson.JsonObject object)
      Converts a JsonObject into a VehicleClass instance.
      Parameters:
      object - the JSON object containing vehicle data
      Returns:
      a VehicleClass populated with data from the JSON

    • getVehicle

      public abstract VehicleClass getVehicle(String license)
      Fetches and returns a VehicleClass based on the provided license plate.
      Parameters:
      license - the license plate number
      Returns:
      a VehicleClass object containing vehicle data

    • getDate

      public LocalDate getDate(String date_str)
      Parses a date string using the API's date pattern.
      Parameters:
      date_str - the date string to parse
      Returns:
      a LocalDate object representing the date

    • getDateStr

      public String getDateStr(String date_str)
      Returns the date string in ISO-8601 format (yyyy-MM-dd).
      Parameters:
      date_str - the original date string
      Returns:
      formatted date as a String

    • getDaysUntilAPK

      public int getDaysUntilAPK(String date_str)
      Calculates the number of days remaining until the given APK (vehicle inspection) date.
      Parameters:
      date_str - the expiration date of the APK
      Returns:
      number of days left until the date, or 0 if the date has passed

    • getJSON

      public String getJSON(String uri) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Performs an HTTP GET request to the specified URI and returns the response body.
      Parameters:
      uri - the URL to request
      Returns:
      the response body as a String
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when sending or receiving
      InterruptedException - if the operation is interrupted
